---
title: Smart Wallet SDK
---
You can learn about it from these three different points of view:

### JS SDK
The source of the JS SDK is in [js-mpc-sdk](https://github.com/artheranet/js-mpc-sdk)

### React example
The source of a React example integrating it is in [arthera-login-react](https://github.com/artheranet/arthera-login-react)

### Deep dive
If you want to dive deep in the signing part it's in [signer](https://github.com/artheranet/js-mpc-sdk/blob/main/src/signer.ts)

:::info

_Latest update: [April 24, 2024](https://github.com/artheranet/arthera-docs)_

:::
